Signal Explanations.tx_state: transmission state indicator that is low (0) during idle and high (1) during active transmission

Logical Operators Explanation.s_eventually: a temporal operator indicating that the contained condition must occur at some future clock cycle (eventually)
Logical Operators Explanation.||: logical OR operator meaning that at least one of the conditions must be satisfied

Assertion 1.Assertion Explaination: Eventually, either the reset condition is asserted or the transmission state indicator shows that the module is idle
